# Copilot Instructions for RepoDemo

- This is a minimal HTML project. The main entry point is `index.html`.
- The project currently displays a simple heading: `HOLA MUNDO`.

## Key Files
- `index.html`: The only source file. Contains the HTML markup for the page.
- `README.md`: Project title only; no additional documentation.

## Developer Workflows
- No build, test, or dependency management tools are present.
- No scripts or automation are defined.
- To view the project, open `index.html` in a web browser.

## Conventions & Patterns
- No custom conventions or patterns are defined.
- No external dependencies or integrations are present.

## Guidance for AI Agents
- Focus on editing or extending `index.html` for any feature work.
- If adding new files or features, document them in `README.md`.
- Keep the project simple and easy to understand.
